content:
info:
  description: A simple Hello World quickstart application demonstrating RESTful API
    design
  title: Hello World API
  version: 1.0.0
description: A simple Hello World quickstart application demonstrating RESTful API design

content:
method: get
operation:
  description: Returns a simple "Hello World" message
  operationId: getHelloWorld
  responses:
    200:
      description: Successful response with hello world message
      schema:
        $ref: '#/definitions/SampleResponse'
    500:
      description: Internal server error
      schema:
        $ref: '#/definitions/ErrorResponse'
  summary: Get Hello World message
  tags:
  - Hello
path: /hello
schemas:
  ErrorResponse:
    properties:
      error:
        description: Error message
        type: string
      timestamp:
        description: Time when error occurred
        format: date-time
        type: string
    type: object
  SampleResponse:
    properties:
      message:
        description: The hello world message
        example: Hello World!
        type: string
    required:
    - message
    type: object

SampleResponse:
  properties:
    message:
      description: The hello world message
      example: Hello World!
      type: string
  required:
  - message
  type: object

ErrorResponse:
  properties:
    error:
      description: Error message
      type: string
    timestamp:
      description: Time when error occurred
      format: date-time
      type: string
  type: object

# Hello World Quickstart

A simple Spring Boot quickstart application demonstrating RESTful API development with a clean layered architecture.

heading: Hello World Quickstart
